title: Ikenai Futari to Hajimete no Batsu
original_name: いけない二人とはじめての罰
sinopse:
It's been 3 months since Mio and Akinao became couple. When they were finally going to experience their first time, "God of marriage" suddenly appeared and punished them! Because of it, if Akinao touches Mio's skin, he will change to a stuffed animal!

Included one-shot: Juken no Megami-sama!
